summary: This document is a series of 30-minute inmate observation check sheets from the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, dated August 8-10, 2019. It records staff signatures for scheduled checks on various tiers (G, H, J, K, L, M, ZB) and includes standard operating procedures for observing inmates in locked-down status. The document is significant as it represents routine prison logs from the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held prior to his death.

events.title: SHU Observation Logs

locations: MCC New York Special Housing Unit
keyFacts: The documents are inmate observation logs from the MCC New York Special Housing Unit dated August 8-10, 2019.
The logs cover multiple tiers (G, H, J, K, L, M, ZB) within the Special Housing Unit.
The procedure requires staff to observe inmates in locked-down status at least twice per hour on an irregular schedule.
Each log sheet includes time frames for morning, day, and evening watches with staff signature blocks.
The documents are routine prison administrative records from the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated.
